Public Member Functions
draw::TextAttr Class Reference

Documentation

This class contains the information needed to draw text. It allows the text to be stored separate from the drawing object.

Public Member Functions

inline

Return the font size

sgfx::Font* draw::TextAttr::set_font ( sgfx::Font *  font)
inline

Specify a font

If no font is specified, the text will use sys::Assets::get_font() to load a font that most closely matches font_size(). If font_size() is zero, the text will get a font that most close matches the height of the container without exceeding the container height.
